text: Renato Bellinelli (born 9 July 1939) is an Italian professional soccer player. He made his Serie C debut in 1958 with Sarom Ravenna, where he remained for three seasons. In 1961 he moved to Livorno, with whom he reached Serie B at the end of the 1963-64 championship. With Labronici he played ten championships, seven of which were in Series B totalling 165 appearances in the cadet series and a total of 237 appearances. This made him the fourth player overall in terms of the number of championship matches with Livorno. Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:Italian footballers
title: Renato Bellinelli
